WRITING.TITLE: IAmA U.S. man, homeless two years, BA degree, history of Major Depression, AMA
WRITING.TEXT:
Throwaway. I do this mostly to educate or dispel stigmata attached to homelessness and mental illness in the U.S.. I will not entertain any job offers or any form of assistance, cash or otherwise (thank you kindly just the same).
Some background:
* have slept outdoors for 23 months in a region where winters are very mild * clean-cut, clean-shaven and well-enough-dressed. The only way you would know I'm homeless is if you stumbled upon me at my urban camp site * laid-off from an okay job with benefits in April 2009 due to state budget cuts * BA degree in Communication * medicated for major depression, otherwise mostly healthy * drug-free and sober * possessions are only a sleeping bag, some clothes, a small backpack and a laptop with case * I travel in the same circles as other homeless people but am acquainted with only a few.
